user.title: Netz NÖ Smart Meter
user.description: Enter your smartmeter.netz-noe.at credentials and meter ID.

data_description.meter_id: Your Austrian meter ID (Zaehlpunkt), 33 characters starting with AT. Dots and spaces are allowed.

reauth_confirm.title: Re-authenticate Netz NÖ Smart Meter
reauth_confirm.description: Your session has expired. Please enter your updated credentials.

abort.unique_id_mismatch: The meter ID does not match the existing entry

backfill_statistics.name: Backfill statistics
backfill_statistics.description: Import historical 15-minute smart meter data into Home Assistant statistics. Existing statistics from this integration are cleared before import. Progress is shown by the Backfill status sensor.

config_entry_id.name: Meter configuration
config_entry_id.description: Select which configured meter to backfill. Required if multiple meters are configured.

start_year.name: Start year
start_year.description: Year to start backfill from, for example 2023. If omitted, the earliest available year is auto-detected.
